name: GamejoltAPI
description: Be careful: most of the actions are Asynchronous !
The request result is stored in a Scene variable of your choice that you can use later.

eventsFunctions.description: Setup a game before using the Gamejolt API.
eventsFunctions.name: RegisterGame
eventsFunctions.sentence: Register a game with identifier _PARAM1_ and secret key _PARAM2_

parameters.longDescription: You can find all these informations in the Gamejolt API Settings of your game.
parameters.name: GameSecretKey

eventsFunctions.description: Activate a test user for the Gamejolt API.
eventsFunctions.name: SetTestUser
eventsFunctions.sentence: Activate tests with the user _PARAM1_ : _PARAM2_

eventsFunctions.description: Fetch complete user data from Gamejolt.
eventsFunctions.name: FetchUser
eventsFunctions.sentence: Send request _PARAM1_ and fetch _PARAM2_ user data using identifier: _PARAM3_

parameters.longDescription:
**Result format** - 
Array named **``users``** of elements having the following structure:
* **``id``** (number): the identifier of the user
* **``type``** (string): the type of user. Can be ``User``, ``Developer``, ``Moderator``, or ``Administrator``
* **``username``** (string): the user's username
* **``avatar_url``** (string): the URL of the user's avatar
* **``signed_up``** (string): how long ago the user signed up
* **``signed_up_timestamp``** (number): the timestamp (in seconds) of when the user signed up
* **``last_logged_in``** (string): how long ago the user was last logged in
* **``last_logged_in_timestamp``** (number): the timestamp (in seconds) of when the user was last logged in
* **``status``** (string): ``Active`` if the user is still a member of the site. ``Banned`` if they've been banned
* **``developer_name``** (string): the user's display name
* **``developer_website``** (string): the user's website (or empty string if not specified) 
* **``developer_description``** (string): the user's profile markdown description
parameters.name: RequestName

parameters.longDescription:
You can use comma-separated list to find multiple users
Example 1: gdevelop,player123,snailmaster
Example 2: 321123,505050,778899
parameters.name: Username

eventsFunctions.description: Authenticate Gamejolt user before using the account functionalities.
eventsFunctions.name: AuthenticateUser
eventsFunctions.sentence: Authenticate user _PARAM1_ / _PARAM2_ on Gamejolt

eventsFunctions.description: Fetch the connected user friend list.
eventsFunctions.name: FetchUserFriends
eventsFunctions.sentence: Send request _PARAM1_ and fetch friends from connected user

parameters.longDescription:
**Result format** - 
Array named **``friends``** of elements having the following structure:
* **``friend_id``** (number): the friend's user identifier
parameters.name: RequestName

eventsFunctions.description: Retrieve the server time.
eventsFunctions.name: FetchServerTime
eventsFunctions.sentence: Send request _PARAM1_ and get the server time

parameters.longDescription:
**Result format** - 
Structure of elements:
* **``timestamp``** (number): the UNIX time stamp (in seconds) representing the server's time
* **``timezone``** (string): the timezone of the server - Example: ``America/New_York``
* **``year``** (number): the current year
* **``month``** (number): the current month
* **``day``** (number): the day of the month
* **``hour``** (number): the hour of the day
* **``minute``** (number): the minute of the hour
* **``second``** (number): the seconds of the minute
parameters.name: RequestName

eventsFunctions.description: Open a game session for the connected user.
eventsFunctions.name: OpenSession
eventsFunctions.sentence: Open a session for the connected user

eventsFunctions.description: Close a game session for the connected user.
eventsFunctions.name: CloseSession
eventsFunctions.sentence: Close a session for the connected user

eventsFunctions.description: Check on the server the session status.
eventsFunctions.name: CheckSession
eventsFunctions.sentence: Check if the user game session is still running

eventsFunctions.description: Change the game session status on the server.
eventsFunctions.name: UpdateSession
eventsFunctions.sentence: Change the game session status to _PARAM1_ and reset the timer

parameters.longDescription:
Status role : 
- keep : keep the same status as before
- active : set that the player is playing the game
- idle : set that the player is waiting

Warning : "keep" will only be sent every 30s to the server. The others are always sent. Be careful.
parameters.name: Status

eventsFunctions.description: Add score to the Gamejolt leaderboard.
eventsFunctions.name: AddScore
eventsFunctions.sentence: Send user or guest _PARAM2_ (force guest: _PARAM1_) score _PARAM3_ _PARAM4_ with extra _PARAM5_ on board _PARAM6_

parameters.description: Guest username (fallback if the player is not connected)
parameters.name: GuestName

parameters.longDescription: Example: 120 for 120km.
parameters.name: Score

parameters.longDescription: Example: "km" for 120km.
parameters.name: Unit

parameters.description: (optional) Extra data you want to save with the score record
parameters.name: Extra

eventsFunctions.description: Add a labelled score in the leaderboard.
eventsFunctions.fullName: Add score with label to the leaderboard
eventsFunctions.name: AddScoreWithLabel
eventsFunctions.sentence: Send user or guest _PARAM2_ (force guest: _PARAM1_) score _PARAM3_ labelled _PARAM4_ with extra _PARAM5_ on board _PARAM6_

parameters.description: Guest username (fallback if the player is not connected)
parameters.name: GuestName

parameters.longDescription: Example: 80 for 80s.
parameters.name: Score

parameters.longDescription: Example: "01:20" for 80s.
parameters.name: Label

parameters.description: (optional) Extra data you want to save with the score record
parameters.name: Extra

eventsFunctions.description: Fetch user's scores on the leaderboard.
eventsFunctions.name: FetchScoreFromUser
eventsFunctions.sentence: Send request _PARAM1_ and fetch user or guest _PARAM3_ (force guest: _PARAM2_ ) _PARAM4_ scores from the board _PARAM5_ filtered _PARAM6_ _PARAM7_

parameters.longDescription:
**Result format** - 
Array named **``scores``** of elements having the following structure:
* **``score``** (number): the score string
* **``sort``** (number): the score's numerical sort value
* **``extra_data``** (string): any extra data associated with the score
* **``user``** (string): if this is a user score, this is the display name for the user
* **``user_id``** (number): if this is a user score, this is the user's identifier
* **``guest``** (string): if this is a guest score, this is the guest's submitted name
* **``stored``** (string): when the score was logged by the user - Example: "1 week ago"
* **``stored_timestamp``** (number): returns the timestamp (in seconds) of when the score was logged by the user
parameters.name: RequestName

parameters.description: Guest username (fallback if the player is not connected)
parameters.name: GuestName

parameters.description: (optional) If a filter is selected, set the score basis to use
parameters.name: FilterScore

eventsFunctions.description: Fetch the best scores on the leaderboard.
eventsFunctions.name: FetchScore
eventsFunctions.sentence: Send request _PARAM1_ and fetch _PARAM2_ best scores from the board _PARAM3_ filtered _PARAM4_ _PARAM5_

parameters.longDescription:
**Result format** - 
Array named **``scores``** of elements having the following structure:
* **``score``** (number): the score string
* **``sort``** (number): the score's numerical sort value
* **``extra_data``** (string): any extra data associated with the score
* **``user``** (string): if this is a user score, this is the display name for the user
* **``user_id``** (number): if this is a user score, this is the user's identifier
* **``guest``** (string): if this is a guest score, this is the guest's submitted name
* **``stored``** (string): when the score was logged by the user - Example: "1 week ago"
* **``stored_timestamp``** (number): returns the timestamp (in seconds) of when the score was logged by the user
parameters.name: RequestName

parameters.description: (optional) If a filter is selected, set the score basis to use
parameters.name: FilterScore

eventsFunctions.description: Fetch the score rank in the leaderboard.
eventsFunctions.name: FetchScoreRank
eventsFunctions.sentence: Send request _PARAM1_ and fetch rank of _PARAM2_ score in the board _PARAM3_

parameters.longDescription:
**Result format** - 
Structure of elements:
* **``rank``** (number): the rank of the score on the score table
parameters.name: RequestName

eventsFunctions.description: Fetch all the leaderboard informations (without scores).
eventsFunctions.name: FetchScoreTables
eventsFunctions.sentence: Send request _PARAM1_ and fetch leaderboards informations

parameters.longDescription:
**Result format** - 
Array named **``tables``** of elements having the following structure:
* **``id``** (number): the identifier of the table
* **``name``** (string): the name of the score table
* **``description``** (string): the description of the score table
* **``primary``** (number): 1 if the table is the primary/default one, 0 instead
parameters.name: RequestName

eventsFunctions.description: Fetch trophies informations of the connected user.
eventsFunctions.name: FetchTrophies
eventsFunctions.sentence: Send request _PARAM1_ and fetch user trophies with filter: _PARAM2_

parameters.longDescription:
**Result format** - 
Array named **``trophies``** of elements having the following structure:
* **``id``** (number): the identifier of the table
* **``title``** (number): the title of the trophy on Gamejolt
* **``description``** (string): the trophy description text
* **``difficulty``** (string): ``Bronze``, ``Silver``, ``Gold``, or ``Platinum``
* **``image_url``** (string): the URL of the trophy thumbnail image
* **``achieved``** (string): the date when the trophy was achieved, "false" instead - Example: "5 days ago"
parameters.name: RequestName

eventsFunctions.description: Fetch trophies (by identifier) informations of the connected user.
eventsFunctions.name: FetchTrophiesByIdentifier
eventsFunctions.sentence: Send request _PARAM1_ and fetch user trophies with identifier: _PARAM2_

parameters.longDescription:
**Result format** - 
Array named **``trophies``** of elements having the following structure:
* **``id``** (number): the identifier of the table
* **``title``** (number): the title of the trophy on Gamejolt
* **``description``** (string): the trophy description text
* **``difficulty``** (string): ``Bronze``, ``Silver``, ``Gold``, or ``Platinum``
* **``image_url``** (string): the URL of the trophy thumbnail image
* **``achieved``** (string): the date when the trophy was achieved, "false" instead - Example: "5 days ago"
parameters.name: RequestName

parameters.longDescription:
You can use a comma-separated list to fetch multiple trophies.
Example: 123123,505050,98700
parameters.name: Trophy

eventsFunctions.description: Set that a trophy has been obtained by the player.
eventsFunctions.name: AddTrophies
eventsFunctions.sentence: Achieve the trophy _PARAM1_

eventsFunctions.description: Remove a trophy from the player achievements.
eventsFunctions.name: RemoveTrophies
eventsFunctions.sentence: Remove the trophy _PARAM1_

eventsFunctions.description: Fetch cloud game data from Gamejolt.
eventsFunctions.name: FetchData
eventsFunctions.sentence: Send request _PARAM1_ to fetch data with key _PARAM3_ in the global (_PARAM2_) or user storage

parameters.longDescription:
**Result format** - 
Structure of elements:
* **``data``** (string): the content of the storage for the specified key
parameters.name: RequestName

parameters.description: Use global storage (instead of user storage)
parameters.name: IsGlobal

eventsFunctions.description: Save game data in the Gamejolt cloud storage.
eventsFunctions.name: StoreData
eventsFunctions.sentence: Store _PARAM3_ with _PARAM2_ key in the global (_PARAM1_) or user storage

parameters.description: Use global storage (instead of user storage)
parameters.name: IsGlobal

eventsFunctions.description: Update a numerical value in the cloud storage.
eventsFunctions.name: DoDataOperation
eventsFunctions.sentence: Changes the value of _PARAM2_ key from the global (_PARAM1_) or user storage: _PARAM3_ _PARAM4_

parameters.description: Use global storage (instead of user storage)
parameters.name: IsGlobal

parameters.description: Operation to do on the data
parameters.name: Operator

eventsFunctions.description: Update a text value in the cloud storage.
eventsFunctions.name: DoDataOperationText
eventsFunctions.sentence: Changes the text of _PARAM2_ key from the global (_PARAM1_) or user storage: _PARAM3_ _PARAM4_

parameters.description: Use global storage (instead of user storage)
parameters.name: IsGlobal

parameters.description: Operation to do on the data
parameters.name: Operator

eventsFunctions.description: Remove cloud game data from Gamejolt.
eventsFunctions.name: RemoveData
eventsFunctions.sentence: Remove data with _PARAM2_ key from the global (_PARAM1_) or user storage

parameters.description: Use global storage (instead of user storage)
parameters.name: IsGlobal

eventsFunctions.description: Fetch all the data keys.
eventsFunctions.name: FetchDataKeys
eventsFunctions.sentence: Send request _PARAM1_ to fetch keys in the global (_PARAM2_) or user storage filtered with _PARAM3_

parameters.longDescription:
**Result format** - 
Array named **``keys``** of elements having the following structure:
* **``key``** (string): the key of the data
parameters.name: RequestName

parameters.description: Use global storage (instead of user storage)
parameters.name: IsGlobal

parameters.longDescription:
How to use patterns : 
- write the part of the key you know, for example "room"
- then put a * where the key can change

Example "room*" will retrieve "room_123" "room_456" "roomABC" etc.
parameters.name: Pattern

eventsFunctions.description: Convert text to SHA1.
eventsFunctions.name: SHA1

inlineCode: var A, B, C, D, E;
for( i=0; i<16; i++ ) W[i] = word_array[blockstart+i];
var temp = cvt_hex(H0) + cvt_hex(H1) + cvt_hex(H2) + cvt_hex(H3) + cvt_hex(H4);
